text: @jaketapper @Mediaite I’ve known this too by reading articles in the NYT and Post, and back when Congress was holding hearings. Here’s an article from over two weeks ago. Why aren’t our leaders as well informed as me, just a regular dude who is paying attention. @BilldeBlasio https://t.co/jhucdj28qj
